languages.text: "Можешь пожертвовать хоть все свои миры Империуму, ксеносам, Чорде и Инквизитору — мне плевать. Но когда на МОЙ мир приходят враги, на МОЕМ мире творятся беспорядки — головы виновных насаживаются на пики".

traits.locale_text: "Можешь пожертвовать хоть все свои миры Империуму, ксеносам, Чорде и Инквизитору — мне плевать. Но когда на МОЙ мир приходят враги, на МОЕМ мире творятся беспорядки — головы виновных насаживаются на пики".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "You may donate all of your worlds to the Imperium, the xenos, Chorda and the Inquisitor — see if I care. But when the enemies come to MY world, when it is MY world that falls into turmoil, the heads of those responsible go up on pikes."
languages.original_text: "Можешь пожертвовать хоть все свои миры Империуму, ксеносам, Чорде и Инквизитору — мне плевать. Но когда на МОЙ мир приходят враги, на МОЕМ мире творятся беспорядки — головы виновных насаживаются на пики".

traits.locale_text: "You may donate all of your worlds to the Imperium, xenos, Chorda and the Inquisitor — see if I care. But when the enemies come to MY world, when it is MY world that falls into turmoil, the heads of those responsible go up on pikes."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "You may donate all of your worlds to the Imperium, the xenos, Chorda and the Inquisitor — see if I care. But when the enemies come to MY world, when it is MY world that falls into turmoil, the heads of those responsible go up on pikes."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "You may donate all of your worlds to the Imperium, the xenos, Chorda and the Inquisitor — see if I care. But when the enemies come to MY world, when it is MY world that falls into turmoil, the heads of those responsible go up on pikes."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: «Usted puede donar todos sus mundos al Imperium, a los xenos, a Chorda y al Inquisidor; me trae sin cuidado. Pero cuando el enemigo invade MI mundo, cuando es MI mundo el que se sume en el caos, las cabezas de los responsables acaban en picas».
languages.original_text: "You may donate all of your worlds to the Imperium, the xenos, Chorda and the Inquisitor — see if I care. But when the enemies come to MY world, when it is MY world that falls into turmoil, the heads of those responsible go up on pikes."

traits.locale_text: «Usted puede donar todos sus mundos al Imperium, a los xenos, a Chorda y al Inquisidor; me trae sin cuidado. Pero cuando el enemigo invade MI mundo, cuando es MI mundo el que se sume en el caos, las cabezas de los responsables acaban en picas».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: “你大可以把你所有的世界献给帝国、异形、库尔达或是审判官，我一点都不在乎。可这里是我的世界！如果敌人闯入我的世界，把它弄得一团糟，我就必须把那些罪魁祸首的脑袋串在长矛上。”
languages.original_text: "You may donate all of your worlds to the Imperium, the xenos, Chorda and the Inquisitor — see if I care. But when the enemies come to MY world, when it is MY world that falls into turmoil, the heads of those responsible go up on pikes."

traits.locale_text: “你大可以把你所有的世界献给帝国、异形、库尔达或是审判官，我一点都不在乎。可这里是我的世界！如果敌人闯入我的世界，把它弄得一团糟，我就必须把那些罪魁祸首的脑袋串在长矛上。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: « Vous pouvez donner tous vos mondes à l'Imperium, aux xénos, à Chorda et à l'inquisiteur si ça vous chante. Mais quand l'ennemi arrive sur MON monde, quand c'est MON monde qui est pris dans la tourmente, les têtes des responsables finissent sur des piques. »
languages.original_text: "You may donate all of your worlds to the Imperium, the xenos, Chorda and the Inquisitor — see if I care. But when the enemies come to MY world, when it is MY world that falls into turmoil, the heads of those responsible go up on pikes."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pouvez donner tous vos mondes à l'Imperium, aux xénos, à Chorda et à l'inquisiteur si ça vous chante. Mais quand l'ennemi arrive sur MON monde, quand c'est MON monde qui est pris dans la tourmente, les têtes des responsables finissent sur des piques. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: 「お前が自分の世界を帝国、異種族、チョーダ、そして異端審問官にすべて明け渡そうと、俺の知ったことではない。だが、敵が俺の世界に来たならば、俺の世界が混乱に陥ったならば、責任者の首は杭に突き刺される」
languages.original_text: "You may donate all of your worlds to the Imperium, the xenos, Chorda and the Inquisitor — see if I care. But when the enemies come to MY world, when it is MY world that falls into turmoil, the heads of those responsible go up on pikes."

traits.locale_text: 「お前が自分の世界を帝国、異種族、チョーダ、そして異端審問官にすべて明け渡そうと、俺の知ったことではない。だが、敵が俺の世界に来たならば、俺の世界が混乱に陥ったならば、責任者の首は杭に突き刺される」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Ihr könnt alle Eure Welten dem Imperium schenken, Xenos, Chorda und dem Inquisitor — es schert mich nicht. Doch wenn die Feinde auf MEINE Welt kommen, wenn es MEINE Welt ist, die ins Chaos gestürzt wird, dann landen die Köpfe der Verantwortlichen auf Pfählen."
languages.original_text: "You may donate all of your worlds to the Imperium, the xenos, Chorda and the Inquisitor — see if I care. But when the enemies come to MY world, when it is MY world that falls into turmoil, the heads of those responsible go up on pikes."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt alle Eure Welten dem Imperium schenken, Xenos, Chorda und dem Inquisitor — es schert mich nicht. Doch wenn die Feinde auf MEINE Welt kommen, wenn es MEINE Welt ist, die ins Chaos gestürzt wird, dann landen die Köpfe der Verantwortlichen auf Pfählen."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "İstersen dünyalarının tamamını İmparatorluk'a, zenolara, Chorda'ya ve Engizisyon'a bağışla. Zerre umursamam. Ancak sonra düşmanlar BENİM dünyama geldiğinde, kıyamet kopan BENİM dünyam olduğunda sorumluların kafaları kazığa oturtulur."
languages.original_text: "You may donate all of your worlds to the Imperium, the xenos, Chorda and the Inquisitor — see if I care. But when the enemies come to MY world, when it is MY world that falls into turmoil, the heads of those responsible go up on pikes."

traits.locale_text: "İstersen dünyalarının tamamını İmparatorluk'a, zenolara, Chorda'ya ve Engizisyon'a bağışla. Bak bakalım umursuyor muyum. Ancak sonra düşmanlar BENİM dünyama geldiğinde, kıyamet kopan BENİM dünyam olduğunda sorumluların kafaları kazığa oturtulur."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale
